human

Class Nurse

  • java.lang.Object
    • others.Resource
      • human.HumanResource
        • human.Nurse

  • public class Nurse
extends HumanResource
    Nurses are part of the human resources A nurse has a patient assigned when it is not idle : currentPatient

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Nurse(String EDname)
      This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.
      Nurse(String EDname, String name)
      This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.
      Nurse(String EDname, String name, String surname)
      This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endOfInstallation(Patient patient)
      This is used to finalize the installation of the patient and to reset the state of the Nurse.

      This is used to access a patient by knowing its Nurse.

      This simulates the registration of a patient, by changing its state to registered using the setState method.

      This is used to assign a patient to a Nurse
      void setState(String state)
      This is used to set the state of this Nurse, it works by moving this Nurse from on line to the other in the NurseList Arraylist (only if it is not already in this line)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Nurse

        public Nurse(String EDname)
        This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.

        Its default state is idle.

        With no name or surname specified, its name and surname are the same and constructed like so : "Nurse" followed by the Nurse ID.

        Her ID is calculated by the getNextID method.

        Parameters:
        EDname - The name of the ED in which you wish to create a Nurse

      • Nurse

        public Nurse(String EDname,
             String name,
             String surname)
        This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.

        Its default state is idle

        Her ID is calculated by the getNextID method.

        Parameters:
        EDname - The name of the ED in which you wish to create a Nurse
        name - The name you wish to give to the Nurse.
        surname - The surname you wish to give to the Nurse.

      • Nurse

        public Nurse(String EDname,
             String name)
        This constructs a Nurse and adds it to the NurseList.

        Its default state is idle.

        With no surname specified, it is constructed like so : "Nurse" followed by the Nurse ID.

        Her ID is calculated by the getNextID method.

        Parameters:
        EDname - The name of the ED in which you wish to create a Nurse
        name - The name you wish to give to the Nurse.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPatient

        public Patient getCurrentPatient()
        This is used to access a patient by knowing its Nurse.
        Returns:
        The Patient instance currently assigned to a Nurse.

      • setCurrentPatient

        public void setCurrentPatient(Patient currentPatient)
        This is used to assign a patient to a Nurse
        Parameters:
        currentPatient - the patient you wish to assign to this Nurse

      • setState

        public void setState(String state)
        This is used to set the state of this Nurse, it works by moving this Nurse from on line to the other in the NurseList Arraylist (only if it is not already in this line)
        Overrides:
        setState in class Resource
        Parameters:
        state - The state in which you wish to set this Nurse.

      • registration

        public void registration(Patient patient)
        This simulates the registration of a patient, by changing its state to registered using the setState method. The patient is then moved to the waitingRoom using the setLocation method.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient this Nurse is resgistering.

      • installation

        public void installation(Patient patient,
                         Room room)
        This simulates the installation of a given patient by this Nurse in a given room.

        The nurse is busy during this operation and the patient is assigned to her, when the patient is installed, the room becomes full and the patient is assigned to it.

        Parameters:
        patient - The patient which is going to be installed.
        room - The room in which the patient is going to be installed.

      • endOfInstallation

        public void endOfInstallation(Patient patient)
        This is used to finalize the installation of the patient and to reset the state of the Nurse. The location of the patient is set and the state of the room is updated to onlyPatient as the nurse as leaved. Finally, the destination of the patient is set ton null and its state to waiting.
        Parameters:
        patient - the patient whiwh is to end its installation in a room.
